CustomField.description: Used to avoid having to create this formula/filter.
CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Regime__c)), "Regime",
IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Prescription__c)), "Prescription",
IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Patient_Order__c)), "Patient Order",
"One and only one field should be populated from the following: Regime, Prescription, Patient Order. Please review to allow this field to function"
)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should read either 'Regime', 'Prescription' or 'Patient Order' - based on which has been populated.
CustomField.label: Parent Record Object
